column4: is there a diagnostic for seeing why my lamp server is not working?
so i can view the contents of my server on my local network, but it cannot be found anywhere outside of my lan.
i have nat set up, plus my firewall is off on my router.
probably, you have to check its documentation
ok, if my settings are correct; I should be able to give my friend my external ip, and it will forward to my servers internal ip. correct?
should i change my server port to 80? or keep it a 3306?
but how does my router know where to go?
but it does not ask me...
you need to consult your router's documentation, I don't know about it
